item.title: Nancy Pelosi, first woman to be House speaker, announces retirement
item.description: A Democrat powerhouse, Pelosi had one of the most consequential legislative careers in history.

item.title: Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland dies at 24
item.description: Dallas Cowboys defensive end Marshawn Kneeland has died at 24, according to the NFL.

item.title: Deadly Typhoon Kalmaegi makes landfall in Vietnam
item.description: Philippines President Ferdinand R. Marcos Jr. approved a state of emergency declaration on Thursday as the storm response continued.

item.title: WATCH: Trump goes after Mamdani a day after NYC mayoral election
item.description: President Trump said he'll "take care" of New York City after self-described democratic socialist Zohran Mandani won the city's mayoral election on Tu...

item.title: WATCH: Tate McRae caught singing into upside-down mic
item.description: Pop star Tate McRae had a viral moment after performing into the wrong end of her microphone.
